mapper.select: /* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.billApply.apply.repository.ApplyMapper.selectApplyDetail */ select em.bill_name_kg -- 안건이름kg , em.bill_name_ru -- 안건이름ru , kgst.fngetlangnm(view.member_nm_kg,view.member_nm_ru,view.member_nm_kg,#{lang}) as member_nm -- 제안자 이름 , em.ppsr_id -- 제안자아이디 , em.etc_kg -- 비고kg , em.etc_ru -- 비고ru , kgst.fngetlangnm(em.etc_kg,em.etc_ru,em.etc_kg,#{lang}) as etc , to_char(em.reg_dt, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:mi') as regDate -- 등록일 , em.scl_dsc_rcp_nmb -- 사회토론번호 , em.ppsl_dt -- 제안일 , em.bill_no -- 안건번호 , (select emc.cmt_cd from kgst.ebs_master_cmt emc where emc.bill_id = em.bill_id and emc.cmt_se_cd = 'M') as cmt_cd , ebi.current_step_id from kgst.ebs_master em left join kgst.ebs_bp_instance ebi on (em.bill_id = ebi.bill_id) left join kgst.view_user_member view on (view.member_id = em.ppsr_id) where em.bill_id = #{billId}
